title: HALF of Twitter Fired, Elon Musk Blames Activists For Revenue Drop

media:group.media:title: HALF of Twitter Fired, Elon Musk Blames Activists For Revenue Drop
media:group.media:description:

Read more HERE:  https://www.theverge.com/2022/11/4/23440510/elon-musk-twitter-revenue-drop-advertising-exodus
